definition: height (of person)/length of clothing from shoulders to bottom (tailor or dressmaker's measure)
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: A dachshund is a dog from Germany with a very long body and short legs.
sentences.chinese: 达克斯是一种身长腿短的德国狗。
肯当时还引进了身长18米的铰接式公交车。

sentences.english: His short legs were not in proportion to his long body.
sentences.chinese: 他的短腿和他的身长不成比例。

sentences.english: She’s also more than a foot long now.
sentences.chinese: 她现在身长也超过了一英尺。

sentences.english: The finely detailed, the hasty, length short legs feeling.
sentences.chinese: 前文细致详尽，后文有些仓促，身长腿短的感觉。

sentences.english: The insect called the water boatman is two millimeters long.
sentences.chinese: 它就是身长只有两毫米的划蝽。

sentences.english: Your baby now weighs in at a little more than a pound and measures about 11 inches.
sentences.chinese: 宝宝现在重量有一磅多点了，身长约11英寸。

sentences.english: He stands 6-4 with a wingspan of nearly 80 inches.
sentences.chinese: 他站直身长6英尺4英寸，双臂伸张近80英尺。

sentences.english: Slightly shorter in length and armholes are cut low.
sentences.chinese: 身长略短，手臂处开口很低。

sentences.english: The missing dog has short legs and a long body.
sentences.chinese: 那条走失的狗身长腿短。

definition: (of sb or sth) whole or entire body
